title: Teen killed, women injured in Bayou Blue shooting
content:
A 17-year-old boy was killed and two women were injured in a shooting Tuesday night at 207 Capri Court in Bayou Blue, the Terrebonne Parish Sheriff’s Office said.
David Trahan Jr., 17, was pronounced dead at the scene, Maj. Malcolm Wolfe said in a news release. The two women were airlifted to a hospital out of the area.
Wolfe said Rhubin Scott Jr., 34, is wanted on one count of second-degree murder and two counts of attempted second-degree murder. He is an ex-boyfriend of one of the female victims.
Deputies and detectives responded about 10:50 p.m. to the shooting, which took place at the home of the second woman, Wolfe said. She is a family member of Scott’s ex-girlfriend.
Wolfe said Scott had gone to his ex-girlfriend’s workplace, caused a disturbance and was asked to leave. He then followed her to her family member’s home.
Scott is considered armed and dangerous, Wolfe said. He asked anyone with information to call the Sheriff’s Office at 876-2500 or Crime Stoppers Bayou Region at 1-800-743-7433.
